article_node.title: Little Movement Seen For Singapore Stock Market
article_node.summary: The Singapore stock market declined on Thursday, with the Straits Times Index falling 16.24 points to close at 4,256.52, amid mixed performances from various sectors. Global market forecasts suggest limited movement ahead of a significant meeting between U.S. and Russian presidents regarding the Russia-Ukraine conflict. Meanwhile, U.S. markets ended mixed following a report of higher-than-expected producer price inflation, although expectations for a potential interest rate cut by the Federal Reserve remain high.
